ISSUE.TITLE: Add tests for returning an error from field update callbacks
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We should always have tests covering functional changes. From https://github.com/WP-API/WP-API/pull/2702#issuecomment-247153482

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add tests for update extra field callback errors. Fixes #2729. Here are tests to show that the update callback can now handle returning errors for the response. The tests just add a returnError flag to the update callback and if that value is supplied an error will be returned.
